standardCurve.turn3: Sell a minion & Buy 2 or Roll 2 times & buy one
standardCurve.turn5: Level up to tavern 3 & Buy 1 minion

fastStandardCurve.turn3: Sell a minion & Buy 2 or Roll 2 times & buy one
fastStandardCurve.turn5: Level up to tavern 3 & Buy 1 minion

jeefCurveToTavern3.heroes: Any hero that wanna get to 3 fast.
jeefCurveToTavern3.notes: On non token Starts : Always with double Mummy / often with double Aco/ non econ pairs
jeefCurveToTavern3.turn3: Buy extra minion if you have token & Level up to tavern 2

jeefCurveToTavern4.heroes: Any hero that wanna get to 3 fast.
jeefCurveToTavern4.notes: On non token Starts : Always with double Mummy / often with double Aco/ non econ pairs
jeefCurveToTavern4.turn3: Buy extra minion if you have token & Level up to tavern 2

warriorCurve.heroes: Any Hero, preferes heroes that increase consistency Like Yogg, Nozdormu, Brann or Reno
warriorCurve.tribes: Econ unites like Murlocs/beast/pirates, Avenge cards being avaiable
warriorCurve.notes: Goals are : setting up an Avenge Setup, make a triple to get a 4 or 5 drops.
warriorCurve.turn3: Sell token & buy 2 minions or roll 2 & Buy 1 minion
warriorCurve.turn5: Double Level up (selling 1 minion to level is needed)

yoggCurve.notes: you need to get a token until turn 3/5 golds
yoggCurve.turn4: HP, sell token & level to tavern 3
yoggCurve.turn5: Roll twice, buy one minion & HP
yoggCurve.turn6: Sell, HP & level up to tavern 4

yoggCurveAggro.notes: you need to get a token until turn 2/4 golds
yoggCurveAggro.turn4: Roll, buy 1 minion & HP or buy 2 minions

rafaamCurve.notes: Finding a right Balance Between Tempo and setting up pairs / generally "recover" on Tavern 4 with no Triple
rafaamCurve.turn4: Level up to tavern 2, buy a minion & HP

akazamzarakCurve.notes: Abusing secrets and setting up pairs that can stabilize on tavern 4
akazamzarakCurve.turn4: Level up to tavern 2, buy a minion & HP
akazamzarakCurve.turn6: Level up to tavern 3 & buy 1 minion

tokiCurve.notes: Abusing secrets and setting up pairs that can stabilize on tavern 4
tokiCurve.turn4: Level up to tavern 3, HP & freeze

pockyCurve.heroes: Hero with 1 gold HPs excluding rafaarm
pockyCurve.turn2: Level up to tavern 2, sell & HP

3on3LevelOn8.heroes: Any hero if shops are bad
3on3LevelOn8.notes: Leveling is better than buying bad cards
3on3LevelOn8.turn6: Level up to tavern 4 & buy a minion

3on3LevelOn9.heroes: Any hero if shops are bad, if you find strong minions
3on3LevelOn9.notes: Leveling is better than buying bad cards
3on3LevelOn9.turn7: Level up to tavern 4, roll twice & Buy a minion

4on4.heroes: Any hero if shops are bad. Favours heros with more comeback mechanics
4on4.notes: Leveling is better than buying bad cards
4on4.turn7: Buy 3 minions or roll thirce & buy 2 minions

sleepyCurve.turn4: Buy 2 tokens (Hold for a 5 or take a 4)

cthunCurve.notes: Mecaw + Selfless as the lategame with shields
cthunCurve.turn6: Roll thirce, buy 1 minion & HP or buy 2 minions & HP
cthunCurve.turn7: Roll, buy 2 minions & HP or Roll thirce, buy 1 minion & HP
cthunCurve.turn8: Level up to tavern 4, buy 1 minion & HP

cthunCurveMechs.notes: Mecaw + Selfless as the lategame with shields
cthunCurveMechs.turn5: Level up to tavern 2, roll, buy a minion & HP

cthunCurveNoMechs.notes: Mecaw + Selfless as the lategame with shields
cthunCurveNoMechs.turn5: Roll twice, buy a minion & HP or buy token, sell, buy a minion & HP or level up to tavern 3, roll & HP

kurthsNormalCurve.turn3: Sell a minion & Buy 2 or roll twice & buy a minion
kurthsNormalCurve.turn5: Level up to tavern 3 & buy 1 minion
kurthsNormalCurve.turn7: Buy 3 minions, sell 3 & Buy 1 (hold a minion in Hand)

kurtrusJkirekCurve.turn3: Sell a minion & Buy 2 or roll twice & buy a minion
kurtrusJkirekCurve.turn5: Level up to tavern 3 & buy 1 minion
kurtrusJkirekCurve.turn7: Buy 3 minions, sell 3 & Buy 1 minion (hold a minion in Hand)
kurtrusJkirekCurve.turn8: Buy 2 minions, roll, sell 3, buy 2, sell 3, buy 1

jandiceTokenCurve.turn3: Buy swaped token, sell 1, buy token again & HOLD
jandiceTokenCurve.turn4: Swap, buy token, buy a minion
jandiceTokenCurve.turn5: Swap, buy token, level up to tavern 3
jandiceTokenCurve.turn6: Swap token, sell 2, buy token, level up to tavern 4

jandiceNoTokenCurve.notes: Rolling on 4 golds when not seeing in double Token is correct
jandiceNoTokenCurve.turn3: Buy token, Swap token, sell 1 & level to tavern 2
jandiceNoTokenCurve.turn5: Swap, buy token, sell 1 & level to tavern 3
jandiceNoTokenCurve.turn6: Swap, buy token & level to tavern 4

omuToken.turn2: Level up to tavern 2 & buy a minion

omuNoToken.turn3: Level up to tavern 2, roll & buy a minion
omuNoToken.turn5: Level up to tavern 3, roll & buy a minion
omuNoToken.turn6: Level up to tavern 4 & buy a minion

omu2Token.turn2: Level up to tavern 2 & buy a token
omu2Token.turn4: Level up to tavern 3 & buy 1 minion
omu2Token.turn5: Level up to tavern 4 & buy 1 minion

millhouseEarlyLevel.turn5: Buy 1 minion & level up to tavern 3

millhouseAggroCurve.turn3: Buy 1 minion, sell 1 & level up to tavern 2
millhouseAggroCurve.turn5: Sell 1, buy 1 minion & level up to tavern 3

millhouseWarriorCurve.turn5: Roll with the 1/4 elemental & buy 4 minions

EudoraDig1.notes: roll dig on turn 1 with all tokens
EudoraDig1.turn3: Level uop to tavern 2, roll & HP
EudoraDig1.turn4: Level up to tavern 3, sell & HP
EudoraDig1.turn5: Level up to tavern 4, sell & HP

EudoraRafaamCurve.notes: roll dig on turn 1 with all tokens
EudoraRafaamCurve.turn4: Level up to tavern 2, buy a minion & HP

EudoraSuicideCurve.notes: Paid actors makes this really good
EudoraSuicideCurve.turn3: Level up to tavern 2, roll & HP
EudoraSuicideCurve.turn4: Level up to tavern 3, sell & HP
EudoraSuicideCurve.turn5: Level up to tavern 4, sell & HP
